Paper.Title: THE JaRAP EXPERIMENTAL SYSTEM OF JAPANESE-RUSSIAN AUTOMATIC TRANSLATION

Section.Paragraph: The paper is the first report on the experimental MT system developed as part of the Japanese-Russian Automatic tra.aslation Project (JaRAP). The system follows the transfer approach to MT. Limited so far to lexico-morphologieal processing, it is seen as a foundation for more ambitious linguistic research.
The system is implemented on IBM PC, MS DOS, in Arity Prolog (analysis and transfer) and Turbo Pascal (synthesis).
